content:
title:开始hexo blogWelcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

title: c#学习
content:
1.环境c#
vs2022
2.c#文件后缀为.cs
using System;namespace HelloWorldApplication{  class HelloWorld  {   static void Main(string[] args)   {     /* 我的第一个 C# 程序*/     Console.WriteLine(“Hello World”);     Console.ReadKey();   }  }}
注意：c#大小写敏感
c#数据类型 1.值类型2.引用类型3.指针类型
1.值类型 bool int char float double 等
